description:
Anthony Fauci's new memoir reminds us that he was the driving force behind gain-of-function research, ruinous lockdowns and devastating school closures, and that he could never accept fault, says Prof Jay Bhattacharya.

The post Anthony Fauci: The Man Who Thought He Was Science appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Anthony Fauci: The Man Who Thought He Was Science

description:
Sharif El-Mekki is a black nationalist with family ties to Iran who supports school segregation and runs a nonprofit that has raked in nearly $20m from the taxpayer and nonprofits, including the Gates Foundation.

The post Black Nationalist Gets $20 Million From Taxpayer and Gates Foundation Among Others to Promote Segregation in Public Schools appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Black Nationalist Gets $20 Million From Taxpayer and Gates Foundation Among Others to Promote Segregation in Public Schools

description:
New Zealand's former Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern received a damehood during an investiture held at Windsor Castle today in honour of her draconian response to COVID-19.

The post Lockdown Queen Jacinda Ardern Receives Damehood at Windsor Castle for Draconian COVID-19 Response appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Lockdown Queen Jacinda Ardern Receives Damehood at Windsor Castle for Draconian COVID-19 Response

description:
Collapsing electric vehicle prices are leaving a growing number of drivers in negative equity, a top dealership chain has warned.

The post Electric Car Drivers “Being Plunged into Negative Equity” as Prices Collapse appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Electric Car Drivers “Being Plunged into Negative Equity” as Prices Collapse

description:
When Suella Braverman tried to speak at Cambridge last week, the university authorities caved into a pro-Palestine mob and allowed her to be cancelled. Starmer is to blame for cancelling the free speech bill, she says.

The post “I Was Cancelled by Cambridge – and Starmer’s Labour Bears the Blame,” Says Suella Braverman appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: “I Was Cancelled by Cambridge – and Starmer’s Labour Bears the Blame,” Says Suella Braverman

description:
In the aftermath of very ordinary-hurricane Milton, it's been claimed that climate change has increased the economic cost of weather disasters. A sober analysis shows this is nonsense, says Paul Homewood.

The post No, Climate Change is Not Increasing the Economic Cost of Hurricanes appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: No, Climate Change is Not Increasing the Economic Cost of Hurricanes

description:
No wonder London is a mess, says Charlotte Gill, when Sadiq Khan and his team are regularly jetting off to hobnob with international elites to advance their civilisation-destroying green and woke agendas.

The post Has the United Nations Wrecked London? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Has the United Nations Wrecked London?
